rules_text:
Vista – {T}: Target player mills cards equal to the number of lands you control. [i](Activate as a sorcery, instead of playing a land on your turn.)[/i]
Vista – {T}: Return target noncreature card that was milled into your graveyard this turn to your hand . [i](Activate as a sorcery, instead of playing a land on your turn.)[/i]
